explains: v. 使高兴，使兴奋（exhilarate 的现在分词）
adj. 使人兴奋的；令人高兴的

sentences.en: He clearly found the physical exertion exhilarating.
sentences.cn: 他明显发现体力消耗令人愉悦。

sentences.en: My first parachute jump was an exhilarating experience.
sentences.cn: 我第一次跳伞的经历很令人激动。

sentences.en: It was exhilarating to be on the road again and his spirits rose.
sentences.cn: 重新上路非常令人欢欣，他的兴致高涨了起来。
